channel.title: CVE Feed for Mattermost -- Mattermost Github Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mattermost -- Mattermost Github Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-2797|2023-06-16T09:03:17.656Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20github%20plugin
item.description: Mattermost fails to sanitize code permalinks, allowing an attacker to preview code from private repositories by posting a specially crafted permalink on a channel.
